languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на Кьяве Гамма саботаж! Культ Последнего восхода проник на планету, взрастил в недрах мануфакторумов свору схизматикалей и натравил ее на нас! Атака была столь внезапна, что мы чуть не утратили все цеха, но... Нам пришли на помощь. Некие сущности, которых уже назвали "инфоангелами", вторглись в когитационную сеть, захватили когитаторы и сервиторов и отразили первый натиск схизматикалей. Сейчас по всей планете ведется ожесточенная борьба, ноосфера мира кипит".

"Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... we had help. Some entities, already being called 'data-angels,' have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and servitors, and used them to repel the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the Noosphere of the world is boiling."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на Кьяве Гамма саботаж! Культ Последнего восхода проник на планету, взрастил в недрах мануфакторумов свору схизматикалей и натравил ее на нас! Атака была столь внезапна, что мы чуть не утратили все цеха, но... Нам пришли на помощь. Некие сущности, которых уже назвали "инфоангелами", вторглись в когитационную сеть, захватили когитаторы и сервиторов и отразили первый натиск схизматикалей. Сейчас по всей планете ведется ожесточенная борьба, ноосфера мира кипит".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of the schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactories and set it upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... Somebody had helped us. Some entities, already named 'Info-Angels', have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and the servitors and repelled the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the noosphere of the world is boiling."

languages.text: “舰长大人，基亚瓦伽马星遭到了蓄意破坏！终末黎明邪教入侵了这颗行星，在制造工厂的内部培养了一群分离者，并驱使它们攻击我们！这场袭击过于突然，我们几乎失去了所有的车间，但是……我们得到了帮助。某种被我们称为‘数据天使’的实体侵入了沉思者网络，控制了沉思者和机仆，利用它们击退了分离者的第一次攻击。此时此刻，一场激烈的战斗正在整颗行星范围内进行，整个世界的通感空间都在沸腾。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... we had help. Some entities, already being called 'data-angels,' have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and servitors, and used them to repel the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the Noosphere of the world is boiling."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，基亚瓦伽马星遭到了蓄意破坏！终末黎明邪教入侵了这颗行星，在制造工厂的内部培养了一群分离者，并驱使它们攻击我们！这场袭击过于突然，我们几乎失去了所有的车间，但是……我们得到了帮助。某种被我们称为‘数据天使’的实体侵入了思考器网络，控制了思考器和奴工，利用它们击退了分离者的第一次攻击。此时此刻，一场激烈的战斗正在整颗行星范围内进行，整个世界的通感空间都在沸腾。”

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, ha habido un acto de sabotaje en Kiava Gamma! El Culto del Amanecer Final ha invadido el planeta, ha criado una manada de cismáticos en las entrañas de los manufactorums, ¡y los ha lanzado contra nosotros! El ataque fue tan repentino que casi perdemos todos los talleres, pero... tuvimos ayuda. Algunas entidades, a las que ya llaman "ángeles de datos", han invadido la red cogitativa, se han apoderado de los cogitadores y los servidores, y los han utilizado para repeler la primera embestida de los cismáticos. Ahora se libra una lucha encarnizada en todo el planeta, la noosfera del mundo está en ebullición».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... we had help. Some entities, already being called 'data-angels,' have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and servitors, and used them to repel the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the Noosphere of the world is boiling."

Ahora se libra una lucha encarnizada en todo el planeta, la noosfera del mundo está en ebullición».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマで妨害行為が発生しました！最後の夜明け魔女団がこの惑星を侵略し、聖工場の地下で分裂せし者の群れを培養し、奴らを使って私たちに攻撃を仕掛けてきました！あまりにも突然の攻撃だったので、すべての工房を失うところでしたが...救いの手が差し伸べられたのです。既に 'データ・エンジェル 'と呼ばれる集団が考算機のネットワークに侵入し、考算機とサーヴィターを捕まえ、奴らを使って分裂せし者の最初の猛攻撃を撃退しました。現在、惑星上では激しい闘争が繰り広げられており、惑星のヌースフィアは沸騰している状態です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... we had help. Some entities, already being called 'data-angels,' have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and servitors, and used them to repel the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the Noosphere of the world is boiling."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、キアヴァ・ガンマで妨害行為が発生しました！最後の夜明け魔女団がこの惑星を侵略し、聖工場の地下で分裂せし者の群れを培養し、奴らを使って私たちに攻撃を仕掛けてきました！あまりにも突然の攻撃だったので、すべての工房を失うところでしたが...救いの手が差し伸べられたのです。既に 'データ・エンジェル 'と呼ばれる集団が考算機のネットワークに侵入し、考算機とサーヴィターを捕まえ、奴らを使って分裂せし者の最初の猛攻撃を撃退しました。現在、惑星上では激しい闘争が繰り広げられており、惑星のヌースフィアは沸騰している状態です」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un acte de sabotage a été perpétré sur Kiava Gamma ! Le Culte de l'Aube finale a envahi la planète et s'est installé dans les entrailles des manufactorums pour y cultiver une horde de schismatiques, puis ils ont lancé ces derniers contre nous ! L'attaque a été si soudaine que nous avons failli perdre tous les ateliers, mais... nous avons reçu une aide inattendue. Des entités, que l'on surnomme déjà les "anges numériques", ont envahi le réseau cogitationnel, se sont emparées des cogitateurs et des servitors, puis les ont utilisés pour repousser l'assaut initial des schismatiques. La planète est désormais le théâtre de combats acharnés qui mettent la noosphère en ébullition. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... we had help. Some entities, already being called 'data-angels,' have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and servitors, and used them to repel the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the Noosphere of the world is boiling."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un acte de sabotage a été perpétré sur Kiava Gamma ! Le Culte de l'Aube finale a envahi la planète et s'est installé dans les entrailles des manufactorums pour y cultiver une horde de schismatiques, puis ils ont lancé ces derniers contre nous ! L'attaque a été si soudaine que nous avons failli perdre tous les ateliers, mais... nous avons reçu une aide inattendue. Des entités, que l'on surnomme déjà les "anges numériques", ont envahi le réseau cogitationnel, se sont emparées des cogitateurs et des serviteurs, puis les ont utilisés pour repousser l'assaut initial des schismatiques. La planète est désormais le théâtre de combats acharnés qui mettent la noosphère en ébullition. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, auf Kiava Gamma wurde ein Sabotageakt verübt! Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung ist auf dem Planeten eingefallen, hat ein Heer von Abtrünnigen in den Tiefen der Manufactorien kultiviert und sie dann auf uns gehetzt! Der Angriff kam so plötzlich und unerwartet, dass wir fast alle Werkstätten verloren haben, aber ... wir hatten Hilfe. Einige Wesen, die von manchen bereits als 'Datenengel' bezeichnet werden, sind in das cogitationale Netzwerk eingedrungen, haben die Cogitatoren und Servitoren requiriert und mit ihrer Hilfe die erste Angriffswelle der Abtrünnigen abgewehrt. Nun herrscht auf dem gesamten Planeten ein erbitterter Kampf. Die Noosphäre der Welt kocht über."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! Einige Wesen, die von manchen bereits als 'Datenengel' bezeichnet werden, sind in das cogitationale Netzwerk eingedrungen, haben die Cogitatoren und Servitoren requiriert und mit ihrer Hilfe die erste Angriffswelle der Abtrünnigen abgewehrt. languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Kiava Gama'da bir sabotaj eylemi gerçekleştirildi! Gezegeni istila eden Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, manufaktorumların derinliklerinde bir araya getirdiği bölücüleri üzerimize saldı! Saldırı öyle aniydi ki neredeyse tüm atölyelerimizi yitiriyorduk... Gerçi imdadımıza yetiştiler. Daha şimdiden 'veri meleği' diye anılan birtakım varlıklar, kavramsayım ağına saldırarak kavramsayarları ve hizmetörleri derdest etti. Ayrıca bunları, bölücülerin ilk taarruzunu püskürtmekte kullandılar. An itibarıyla gezegen çapında çetin bir çatışma sürmekte. Noosfer kaynıyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there has been an act of sabotage on Kiava Gamma! The Cult of the Final Dawn has invaded the planet, cultivated a pack of schismaticals in the bowels of the manufactorums, and set them upon us! The attack was so sudden that we almost lost all the workshops, but... we had help. Some entities, already being called 'data-angels,' have invaded the cogitational network, seized the cogitators and servitors, and used them to repel the first onslaught of the schismaticals. Now there is a fierce struggle taking place all over the planet, the Noosphere of the world is boiling."
